section.title: Introduction
section.p: One of the most common operations in database-driven websites is to display information to the user. Makumba provides a query-based approach to this through its mak:object and mak:list tags.

section.title: Displaying data through queries
section.p: Both mak:object and mak:list use the same general principles for displaying data. mak:object is meant to handle only one object, while mak:list handles multiple objects. In the following introductionnary examples, we will use mak:object in order to explain the general mechanism.
